Marc Marquez: Saya Tak Perlu Bohong pada Jorge Lorenzo
01 Nov 2019, 12:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez, sama sekali tak berambisi mematahkan rekor poin terbanyak dalam semusim yang saat ini masih dipegang tandemnya sendiri, Jorge Lorenzo. Hal ini ia nyatakan dalam jumpa pers MotoGP Malaysia di Sepang pada Kamis (31/10/2019).
Lorenzo sukses meraup 383 poin pada 2010, saat ia meraih gelar dunia perdananya di kelas tertinggi. Saat ini, Marquez telah mengoleksi 375 poin, dan berpeluang besar untuk mematahkan rekor Lorenzo tersebut. Meski begitu, ia mengaku rekor ini tak terlalu penting baginya.
"Strategi saya tetap sama, meski saya bisa menjadi rider dengan poin terbanyak. Tapi rekor ini hanya akan diingat ketika seseorang mematahkannya, dan saya tak terlalu peduli. Yang saya targetkan hanyalah podium dan kemenangan," ujarnya seperti dikutip GPOne.
text:
Marc Marquez: I don't need to lie to Jorge Lorenzo
Nov 1 2019, 12:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Repsol Honda rider Marc Marquez has no ambition to break the record for most points in a season which is currently still held by his own tandem, Jorge Lorenzo. This he stated in a Malaysian MotoGP press conference in Sepang on Thursday (10/31/2019).
Lorenzo successfully earned 383 points in 2010, when he won his first world title in the highest class. Currently, Marquez has collected 375 points, and has a great chance to break Lorenzo's record. Even so, he claimed this record was not too important for him.
"My strategy remains the same, even though I can become a rider with the most points. But this record will only be remembered when someone breaks it, and I do not really care. I target only the podium and victory," he said as quoted by GPOne.
